name: Kobold
description: Kobolds are small, reptilian humanoids with features that blend lizard-like and canine traits. Once blessed with the monumental task of rearing drakes in the Age of Dragons, kobolds have since abandoned that lineage, instead building sprawling cities throughout the tunnels of Kragfel that have yet to be mapped. Kobolds are known for their exceptionally short lives and large families, resulting in a culture that values initiative over playing it safe.

options.name: Small
options.description: Kobolds are small creatures. All of your finesse skills are upgraded and your physique skills downgraded. You also have a -1 penalty to movement speed.

options.name: Born to Fight
options.description: Kobolds are born for battle. You gain +1 skill with simple melee and simple ranged weapons and +1 skill with evasion.

options.name: Reaction : Play Dead
options.description: In response to taking damage, you fall prone and convincingly play dead. A creature cannot deduce that you are alive unless making a contested senses or medicine check against your expression if they have reason to suspect.

options.name: Fragile
options.description: Kobolds are naturally fragile creatures. You suffer a -5 penalty to your maximum health and a -1 penalty to your physical mitigation.
